name: Claudia
line: "How was what?" The greatest night of the year, of course.

name: Dustin
line: Oh. Oh, yeah, it was... It was, uh, tubular.

name: Dustin
line: Awesome, right? Yeah... I rigged the trap with, uh, a motor to make it look like I caught a ghost. Just like the movie.

name: Dustin
line: Funny. Look at that. Look at that.

name: Dustin
line: I told you to keep quiet. All you had to do was stay still for one minute. One minute.

name: Dustin
line: What were you doing in my trash?

name: Dustin
line: You're pretty cute, you know that? I'm glad I found you.

name: Dustin
line: D'Artagnan. I'm gonna call you d'Artagnan.

name: Hopper
line: So that's it, huh? You're still not talking?

name: Hopper
line: All right. I guess I'm just gonna have to, uh... enjoy this triple-decker Eggo extravaganza on my own.

name: Hopper
line: Know the great thing about it? It's only 8,000 calories.

name: Hopper
line: You visited him again last night?

name: Hopper
line: Want me to go check on him?

name: Hopper
line: I know that you miss him, all right? But it's too dangerous. You're the last thing he needs right now.

name: Hopper
line: You're gonna see him. Soon. And not just in that head of yours. You're gonna see him in real life. I feel like I'm making progress with these people.

name: Eleven
line: You say "soon" on day 21. You say "soon" on day 205. You now say "soon" on day 326?

name: Hopper
line: What is this? You're counting the days now like you're some kind of prisoner?

name: Hopper
line: "Soon" is when... it's not dangerous anymore.

name: Eleven
line: I need to see him. Tell me!

name: Hopper
line: I said I... Oh! Shit! Shit!

name: Bob
line: A-ha! Found 'em. Hiding under some jeans, sneaky little buggers.

name: Joyce
line: Thank you. Thank you. You're a life saver. Can you take Will to school today? I cannot be late again.

name: Joyce
line: Can you just take Will, please?

name: Joyce
line: Will you make sure he gets in okay?

name: Bob
line: What do you say, big guy? Wanna go for a ride in the Bobmobile?

name: Unknown
line: Mr. Henderson, you know the rules. Five at a time.

name: Dustin
line: Yep. One, two, three, four and five.

name: Unknown
line: You already have five books checked out.

name: Dustin
line: My mistake. However... I am on a curiosity voyage, and I need my paddles to travel. These books... These books are my paddles.

name: Dustin
line: What the hell is... Mr. Henderson! I need my paddles!

name: Bob
line: Was that you I heard milling around last night, or was that a ghost?

name: Bob
line: Did I ever tell you about Mr. Baldo?

name: Bob
line: Yeah. I was a little younger than you, standing in line for the Ferris wheel at the Roane County fair. And suddenly, I feel this fat white glove tap me on the shoulder. I spin around, and there he is. Mr. Baldo. "Hey, kiddo, would you like a balloon?" Go ahead, laugh. It's funny.

name: Bob
line: It wasn't funny back then, I can tell you that. I couldn't get him out of my head. Every night, he would come to me in my dreams. And every night when he came to me... I ran.

name: Bob
line: It got so bad that I made my mom stay in the room with me until I could fall asleep every night.

name: Bob
line: Really. It went on like that for months. And then one day, the nightmares suddenly stopped.

name: Bob
line: How? Well, I fell asleep... and just like always, Mr. Baldo came to me. Only this time, I didn't run. This time, I stood my ground. I just looked at Mr. Baldo in his stupid face, and I said, "Go away. Go away!" Just like that, he was gone. Never saw him again.

name: Max
line: I still don't get why they call him zombie boy.

name: Lucas
line: I mean, I get it. He got lost in the woods for a week or something, but why is he a zombie? Because everyone thought he was dead?

name: Max
line: Yeah. I mean, we had a funeral for him and everything.

name: Max
line: Well, see, some other kid drowned at the quarry. We thought it was Will because his body was super decomposed.

name: Lucas
line: It's not a joke, all right? It's public knowledge. You can ask anybody. Except Will, because he is really sensitive about it. All right?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: The case of Phineas Gage is one of the great medical curiosities of all time.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Phineas was a railroad worker in 1848 who had a nightmarish accident. A large iron rod was driven completely through his head.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Phineas miraculously survived. He seemed fine. And physically, yes, he was.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: But his injury resulted in a complete change to his personality. So much so that friends that knew him started referring to him as "No longer Gage." At the time, this was known as the American Crowbar Case.

name: Dustin
line: I am so sorry, Mr. Clarke. Really, I'm so sorry. Please continue with the class.

name: Dustin
line: Don't mind me. Really, continue, please. Thanks.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Although it wasn't a crowbar, it was a rod, as I said.

name: Dustin
line: We have to meet. All of us. At lunch, AV Club.

name: Dustin
line: I have something that you won't believe.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Would you care to join the class now?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: And he began to curse, using terrible words that I don't dare repeat here.

name: Powell
line: And we found some more by Gilbert's farm.

name: Hopper
line: That was it, or you get tired of looking?

name: Callahan
line: I mean, it was really dark.

name: Powell
line: Oh, okay. Someone woke up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.

name: Powell
line: You want us to go back out there?

name: Callahan
line: Why's he gotta kick the door?

name: Hopper
line: My granddad used to live here. Long time ago.

name: Hopper
line: I mainly just use it for storage now.

name: Hopper
line: So, uh... what do you think? It's a work-in-progress. You know, it's, uh... It takes a little imagination, but, uh... once we fix it up, it's gonna be nice. Real nice.

name: Hopper
line: Oh, yeah. Yeah, yeah. All right, this... this is music.

name: Hopper
line: All right. Let's get to work.

name: Hopper
line: Okay. Now, this is called a trip wire. It's like an alarm.

name: Hopper
line: You, uh, set it up like this. And then, anybody gets close, it's gonna make a loud noise like, uh, gunfire. Bang!

name: Hopper
line: Those bad men aren't gonna find ya. All right? Not way the hell out here. We'll take some precautions.

name: Hopper
line: There's gonna be a couple ground rules.

name: Hopper
line: Rule number one: always keep the curtains drawn.

name: Hopper
line: Rule number two: only open the door if you hear my secret knock.

name: Hopper
line: And rule number three: don't ever go out alone, especially not in the daylight.

name: Hopper
line: I call 'em the, uh... Don't Be Stupid Rules.

name: Unknown
line: Harrington, right? I heard you used to run this school. That true? King Steve, they used to call you, huh? Then you turned bitch.

name: Steve
line: Hey, maybe you should just shut up and just play the game.

name: Unknown
line: Whoo! That's what I'm talking about! Whoo!

name: Steve
line: Where were you this morning? I missed first period.

name: Nancy
line: I figured Jonathan would take you.

name: Steve
line: Wha... What are you talking about?

name: Nancy
line: Jesus, you really can't handle your alcohol.

name: Nancy
line: You remember going to Tina's party last night, right?

name: Steve
line: I remember dancing, and... spilling some punch. You got mad at me because I was drunk... and then you took me home.

name: Nancy
line: No, see, that's where your mind gets a little bit fuzzy. That was your other boyfriend. That was... That was Jonathan.

name: Nancy
line: It's pretty simple, Nancy. You were just telling it like it is.

name: Nancy
line: Uh... apparently, uh... we killed Barb and I don't care, 'cause I'm bullshit... and our whole... our whole relationship is bullshit, and... I mean, pretty much everything is just bullshit, bullshit, bullshit. Oh, yeah, also, you don't love me.

name: Steve
line: I was drunk, Steve. I don't remember any of that.

name: Nancy
line: So that makes everything that you said... It's what? Just bullshit, too?

name: Unknown
line: Harrington! Dude, we need you, man. That douchebag's killing us. Let's go!

name: Mike
line: And he was in your trash?

name: Lucas
line: Ugh, he's like a living booger.

name: Dustin
line: My question exactly. At first, I thought it was some type of pollywog.

name: Dustin
line: It's another word for tadpole. A tadpole is the larval stage of a toad.

name: Mike
line: I know what a tadpole is.

name: Dustin
line: All right, then you know that most tadpoles are aquatic, right? Well, Dart, he isn't. He doesn't need water.

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, but aren't there nonaquatic pollywogs?

name: Dustin
line: Terrestrial pollywogs? Yep. Two to be exact. Indirana semipalmata. And the Adenomera andreae. One's from India, one's from South America.

name: Mike
line: So how did one end up in my trash?

name: Lucas
line: Maybe some scientists brought it here, and it escaped?

name: Mike
line: Do you guys see that? Looks like something is moving inside of it.

name: Dustin
line: Whoa. It's okay. It's okay. I got you, little guy. I know you don't like that. It's okay.

name: Dustin
line: And there's another thing. Reptiles, they're cold-blooded. Ectothermic, right? They love heat, the sun. Dart hates it. It hurts him.

name: Dustin
line: So, if he's not a pollywog or a reptile... Then I've discovered a new species.

name: Mike
line: We gotta show him to Mr. Clarke.

name: Dustin
line: What if he steals my discovery?

name: Lucas
line: He's not gonna steal your discovery.

name: Dustin
line: You know, I'm thinking about calling it Dustonious pollywogus. What do you think?

name: Dustin
line: When I become rich and famous for this one day, don't come crawling back, saying, "Oh, my God, Dustin, I'm so sorry for being mean to you back in 8th grade. Oh, my God."

name: Bob
line: I'm sorry if I overstepped anything.

name: Bob
line: Okay. I mean... I like you so much. Not just you, everything that comes with you. Your family, your boys.

name: Bob
line: And I hope it's not wishful thinking, but... I kinda feel like I'm breaking through with them. Not so much Jonathan. He's a tough cookie to crack, but... with Will, I don't know, I feel like we're connecting.

name: Joyce
line: Yeah. He likes you, too. I can tell.

name: Bob
line: Oh, there was... something else I was gonna mention, but... It's not a big deal at all, but... I just noticed this morning that my JVC was a little dinged up.

name: Bob
line: Yeah. It still works fine and everything. I just... I went back and watched the tape... and there were some older kids picking on Will.

name: Joyce
line: What? Who were they? Were they the Zimmerman brothers again?

name: Bob
line: Um, I don't know. They were wearing masks or sort of makeup and... Maybe. They were the right age.

name: Joyce
line: I'll kill them. I swear to God, I will... I will kill them.

name: Bob
line: That's what I love about you. You punch back.

name: Bob
line: I was never really one to put up a fight. I struggled a lot like Will when I was a kid. With bullies.

name: Bob
line: It's the ones like us, that don't punch back, that people really take advantage of, you know? They rub your nose in it, just a little bit more.

name: Bob
line: I don't know why they do that. Maybe it makes them feel powerful. I don't know.

name: Bob
line: But, hey, look at me now. I get to date Joyce Byers. Ha! Are you kidding me? I get to date... It all works out in the end, doesn't it?

name: Hopper
line: Grass, crops, trees. Everything in this area is either dead or dying, and that's a radius of over three miles. And it all leads back to here.

name: Hopper
line: See, these patterns here are really pretty. I like the design. It's almost psychedelic.

name: Owens
line: This is a joke to you, huh?

name: Hopper
line: No, it's not a joke. I just... I don't understand what this has to do with me, Chief Hopper.

name: Owens
line: Whatever is happening is spreading from this place, from this lab.

name: Hopper
line: That's impossible. It's... The last burn was two days ago. It's contained.

name: Owens
line: I don't know, man. You're the scientist.

name: Hopper
line: Exactly. And I'm telling you there's nothing to worry about.

name: Hopper
line: Convince you? Yeah. You and your egghead friends go out there to every area on this map and you run your tests, or whatever the hell it is you do, and you see if anything comes up.

name: Owens
line: All right, so... So you're... you're giving me orders now?

name: Hopper
line: No. I keep things nice and quiet for you... and you keep your shit out of my town. That is the deal. I have done my part, now you do yours.

name: Jonathan
line: So, he asked you to take me home?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, he was upset. I mean, he was... He was really upset. But he was still worried about you.

name: Nancy
line: Hey. You need to cut yourself some slack, okay? People say stupid things when they're wasted. Things they don't mean.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, but that's the thing. What if I did mean it?

name: Nancy
line: All this time, I've been trying so hard to pretend like everything's fine, but it's not.

name: Jonathan
line: I... I feel like there's this... I don't know, like this... Like there's this weight you're carrying around with you. All the time. I feel it, too.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, but it's different for you. Will came home.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah. Yeah, he did. But he's not the same.

name: Nancy
line: I try to be there for him, you know, to help him, but... I don't know.

name: Jonathan
line: I mean, maybe... maybe things just can't go back to the way they were.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, that those... those people who did this, who ruined so many lives, they just get away with it.

name: Jonathan
line: The people responsible for this... they're dead.

name: Nancy
line: Do you wanna skip fourth period?

name: Hopper
line: "I would feel so sad if I thought I was a disappointment to her... because she didn't live very long after that, you see. She died of a fever when I was just three months old. I do wish she'd lived long enough for me to remember calling her mother. I think it would be so sweet to say 'mother.'"

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, of course you have a mother. You couldn't really be born without one.

name: Hopper
line: "And, uh, father died four days afterwards from fever, too. That left me an orphan and folks were at their wits' end, so Mrs. Thomas said to me, what to do with me. You see, nobody wanted me even then. It seems to be my fate."

name: Hopper
line: The school? It's, uh... it's about a mile that way. At least.

name: Bob
line: RadioShack, Bob Newby speaking. How can I help ya?

name: Joyce
line: Hey, um... I'm trying to watch your video thingy, and the tape, it's... it's tiny. It's like it's shrunk.

name: Bob
line: That's 'cause it's a VHS-C, not a VHS. You gotta find the RF-P1U with coaxial cable so you can connect the video ins and outs.

name: Bob
line: Right. Sorry. Um... No, yeah, I did the coaxial things in the back, so I... This one just goes into the camera itself?

name: Joyce
line: Yeah. Yeah, exactly. It's blue. I think it's working.

name: Nancy
line: So you hit T to zoom in, and W zooms back out. See? Easy-peasy.

name: Dustin
line: Will, you coming? Let's go show Mr. Clarke.

name: Dustin
line: What? It's about d'Artagnan. This is the reason I was late for class.

name: Dustin
line: Well, yeah, obviously. But it's not about the trap. It's what's inside. Now, this very well may change your perception of the world.

name: Dustin
line: All right, first, let's just clarify that... this is my discovery, not yours.

name: Dustin
line: I'm just trying to clarify... Okay, fine.

name: Mike
line: Stop! I'm sorry, Mr. Clarke. It was just a stupid prank.

name: Mike
line: I told him to stop. We need to go.

name: Unknown
line: So, your sister coming or what?

name: Billy
line: Screw it. That little shit can skate home.

name: Max
line: Hello? Hello? Guys, come on. Can I come in yet?

name: Max
line: Will saw something that looked like Dart last year?

name: Will
line: Kind of, but there was no tail.

name: Mike
line: But then he heard it yesterday. The exact same sound.

name: Max
line: Why didn't you tell us before?

name: Mike
line: Or not. What if when Will was stuck in the Upside Down, he somehow acquired True Sight?

name: Dustin
line: It gives you the power to see into the ethereal plane.

name: Mike
line: Maybe these episodes that Will keeps having aren't really flashbacks at all. Maybe they're real. Maybe Will can somehow see into the Upside Down.

name: Mike
line: Dart is from the Upside Down.

name: Dustin
line: We have to take him to Hopper.

name: Dustin
line: No way. If we take him to Hopper, Dart's good as dead.

name: Mike
line: How can you not? He's from the Upside Down.

name: Dustin
line: Maybe. But even if he is, it doesn't automatically mean that he's bad.

name: Mike
line: That's like saying just because someone's from the Death Star doesn't make them bad.

name: Mike
line: A bond? Just because he likes nougat?

name: Dustin
line: Yes, I promised I would take care of him.

name: Max
line: Guys, what's going on? Come on.

name: Dustin
line: Don't hurt him. Don't you hurt him!

name: Karen
line: Uh... Mrs. Wheeler. What a pleasant surprise.

name: Karen
line: Uh, we have a test tomorrow.

name: Nancy
line: Oh, uh, yeah. My Walkman broke.

name: Karen
line: Anyway, we should go. It's a really big test.

name: Nancy
line: Bye! It's good to see you.

name: Jonathan
line: Okay, are you sure about this?

name: Nancy
line: Mrs. Holland. Hi, it's, um... it's Nancy.

name: Nancy
line: I, uh... I need to tell you something. Something about Barb. About that night. I, uh... I haven't been honest with you.

name: Nancy
line: But I can't tell you here on the phone. Meet me tomorrow, Forrest Hills Park, 9:00 a.m. Don't tell anyone. And don't call me back here. It's dangerous.

name: Nancy
line: I just need you to trust me. Please.

name: Owens
line: Well, you were right about these pumpkins. Some nasty stuff.

name: Owens
line: And the smell... Gee, mother of God.

name: Hopper
line: What exactly do you think is going on...

name: Owens
line: Well, I told you what I think. But we'll run the tests, and we'll see what comes up.

name: Owens
line: In the meantime, I just need you to keep the area clear for us. I don't think it'll be more than a day or two.

name: Hopper
line: What do you want me to tell people?

name: Owens
line: I'm sure you'll figure something out.

name: Powell
line: Do you remember that Russian girl Murray was going on about the other day?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, well, now I'm thinking he's not so crazy after all.

name: Powell
line: Stay where you are. Do not move.

name: Mike
line: East is clear. No sign of Dart.

name: Dustin
line: Where'd you go, you little bastard?

name: Lucas
line: Sorry, I was looking for study hall. Bye.

name: Max
line: What the hell are you doing?

name: Mike
line: What are you doing? Why are you in here?

name: Max
line: Why do you hate me so much?

name: Mike
line: I don't hate you. How can I hate you? I don't know you.

name: Max
line: But you don't want me in your party.

name: Mike
line: Because you're annoying. Also, we don't need another party member. I'm our paladin, Will's our cleric, Dustin's our bard, Lucas is our ranger, and El is our mage.

name: Mike
line: She was in our party a long time ago. She moved away, okay?

name: Mike
line: Well, what could she do? Like, magic tricks or something?

name: Max
line: Well, I could be your zoomer.

name: Mike
line: That's not even a real thing.

name: Max
line: Come on, you know you're impressed.

name: Mike
line: I don't see any tricks. You're just going around in a circle.

name: Max
line: If it's so easy, you try it.

name: Max
line: So, then you admit it's kind of impressive.

name: Mike
line: I think if I spent, like, all day practicing, I could do that.

name: Max
line: I would give you a million bucks if you could.

name: Mike
line: Okay, you're making me dizzy. Please just stop.

name: Max
line: I'll stop when I join your party.

name: Max
line: It's a simple question. Am I in or out?

name: Max
line: I don't know. It was like a magnet or something pulling on my board. I know that sounds crazy.

name: Joyce
line: Come on, come on, come on!

name: Unknown
line: Hawkins Middle. May I help you?

name: Joyce
line: Yes. Hi, Doris. It's Joyce. Uh, Joyce Byers. Will has AV Club today. Could you transfer me to Mr. Clarke?

name: Doris
line: Mr. Clarke? Huh. You know what? I just saw him leave for the day. Maybe AV was canceled?

name: Lucas
line: In the bathroom by Mr. Salerno's.

name: Dustin
line: It's okay. I'm not gonna hurt you.

name: Dustin
line: Hey, buddy. Come here. You know I won't hurt you.

name: Dustin
line: It's okay. It's just me. You're okay.

name: Bob
line: Only this time, I didn't run.

name: Bob
line: This time, I stood my ground.
